7_17fgJ3tZjhM7HCkTkd5TWf2BLLWmhRKcXB.body:
I can only assume that you are asking what we will do if ppl start sharing child pornography around here. I asked this myself before coming in here. And the anwser is that there is no answer.
We all know what is right and wrong, and like they said "Vox Populi, Vox Dei". Those users will be cast out by the others. THe problem here is the system itself. If there are no admins, them who will ban this kind of material? The awnser is no one. 
Like the problem Apple is facing right now against the US goverment, the only way to have control over the system ( including ZeroNet) would be by allowing a backdoor to exploited. But if you do this, the entire system will crumble at the first attck of any goverment.
This may become a darknet in the future. Maybe since everybody here ppers the website, we ( as in everybody)should have control of what our computers will accept as material. Like, an option where I will accept every information except pictures and movies. This would be a way to avoid child pornography, random acts of violence and monetary scam.

1_1AkE5mjeYRiQLGF8Q6NmGvpkm1kk1R6zMe.body:
Not sure if such a thing would work. I mean. Imagine the ammount of data that would be uploaded to our computers by other users. Just one movie in BluRay would be something like 8Gb. And since we are a descentralized system, the entire thing would crimble unless they use a server dedicated for this. But this would be too expensive and would take the purpose of the Zero ecosystem.
If you want a Youtube, just go to Youtube. I think the purpose of this tech is to both creat conten for free and be used a free speech plataform, in the mold of the old 4chan (when it was really free).
